# Flavor Events for Papacy
# VEF

namespace = vef_papacy 

#Cardinals#
#1 Cardinal Death (Province)
#2 New Cardinal
#3 New Cardinal for Seat (Decision)
#4 Too few Roman Cardinals
#5 Too few French Cardinals (Pre-Schism)
#6 Cardinal Decides where to go
#7 Notification of Cardinal Death
#8 New Pope - How to handle France?
#85 Seat Removal (Papal control or non-catholic )
#86 Seat Restoration
#87 Seat for Valencia
#88 Seat for Sevilla
#89 Seat for Lisboa
#90 Seat for York
#91 Seat for Reims
#92 Seat for Marseille
#93 Seat for Trier
#94 Seat for Vienna
#95 Seat for Navarra
#96 Seat for Spanish Ideas
#97 Seat for Religious Ideas
#98 Calculate Schism Majority (Maintenance)
#99 Cardinal Age (Maintenance)

#Elections#
#100 Pre-Schism Election1
#101 Pre-Schism Election2
#102 Schism Elections
#103 Post-Schism Elections - Death of Pope
#104 Post-Schism Elections - Country Support
#105 Post-Schism Elections - Investment
#106 Post-Schism Elections - First Scrutiny
#107 Post-Schism Elections - Succeeding Scrutinies
#108 Post_Schism Elections - Define Pope
#109 Endgame - Pope Dies
#110 Endgame Elections1
#111 Clear Majority
#112 Bribes
#113 Endgame Elections2
#114 Endgame Elections3
#115 Endgame Elections3 - AI
#116 French Pope
#117 Spanish Pope
#118 Borgia Pope
#119 British Pope
#120 Roman Pope
#121 North-Italian Pope
#122 Neopolitan Pope
#123 Medici Pope
#124 Sforza Pope
#125 Este Pope
#126 Ultramontane Pope

#Sede Vacante
#150 Generate Pope if starting without one

#Schism#
#200 Western Schism
#201 Player Choose Sides - Schism
#202 Change Sides at New Monarch?
#203 Schism Ended by Cardinal Majority
#204 Schism Ended by Force1 - Actor
#205 Schism Ended by Force2 - PAP
#206 Ended for Rome
#207 Ended for Avignon
#208 Council of Constance - Schism Ends
#209 Inform Catholics of Council
#210 In case of AVI victory, Pope returns to Rome on next ruler
#211 Schism Setup For Starting Game During Schism

#College Endgame#
#Starts at 15
#End of Schism sets to 20
#300 Grows to 30 (1500)
#301 Enters Endgame
#302 Endgame Message


#Sforza#
#400 Cardinal of Milan to Sforza
#401 End of the Sforza

#Medici#
#500 Medici Request a Florentine Cardinal
#501 PAP - Medici Cardinal Request
#502 Pope Grants
#503 Pope Refuses
#504 End of Medici
#505 Pope Restores Medici to Florence
#506 Archduchy free on death of Medici Pope

#Borgia#

#Pope Converted#
#800 Eastern
#801 Reformers

#Papal Influence#
#900 Decision
#901 Cardinals

#Flight of the Pope#
#1000 Papacy Annexed (on-action)
#1001 Pope Flees
#1002 Vatican City?
#1003 Exile
#1004 Exile - Repeat
#1005 Exile - Death in Wandering Exile
#1006 Exile - Rome Freed
#1007 Exile - Rome Taken
#1008 Exile - Owner of Rome offers Vatican
#1009 Exile - Pope Returns to Vatican

#Virtus Post Solium
#2000 VPS Calculation (AI Only)
#2001 Inform old VPS they lost position
#2002 Guarantee/Alliance to keep VPS
#2003 Request VPS
#2004 Accept
#2005 Refused


# Cardinal Relations
# 0 - 30 Dislike
# 31 - 67 Neutral
# 68 - 100 Loyal

# Cardinal Power
# 0 - 20   No Influence
# 21 - 59  Average Cardinal
# 60 - 84  Significant Power (election contenders)
# 85 - 100 Power behind Papal Throne (almost certain election)

#############
# Cardinals #
#############

# Death of a Cardinal
province_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1
	title = vef_papacy.1.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
		NOT = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 600
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.8
			check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 30 }
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 40 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.6
			check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 40 }
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.4
			check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.2
			check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 }
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 } }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.1
			check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1.opta"
		owner = { change_variable = { which = vef_our_cardinals value = -1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_college_size value = -1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = -0.66 }}
		remove_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
			remove_province_modifier = cardinal_present
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_court }
			clr_province_flag = cardinal_court
			owner = { remove_country_modifier = cardinal_court }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
			clr_province_flag = cardinal_rome
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
			clr_province_flag = large_investment
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
			clr_province_flag = small_investment
		}
		trigger_switch = {
			on_trigger = has_province_flag
			french_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = french_cardinal
			}
			spanish_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = spanish_cardinal
			}
			british_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = british_cardinal
			}
			northitalian_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = northitalian_cardinal
			}
			neopolitan_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = neopolitan_cardinal
			}
			medici_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = medici_cardinal
			}
			sforza_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = sforza_cardinal
			}
			este_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = este_cardinal
			}
			ultramontane_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = ultramontane_cardinal
			}
			roman_cardinal = {
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = roman_cardinal
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal }
			AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = -1 }}
			clr_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal }				
			AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = -1 }}
			clr_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_province_flag
				cardinal1 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal1
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal1_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal2 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal2
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal2_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal3 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal3
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal3_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal4 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal4
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal4_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal4_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal4_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal5 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal5
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal5_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal5_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal5_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal6 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal6
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal6_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal6_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal6_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal7 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal7
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal7_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal7_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal7_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal8 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal8
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal8_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal8_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal8_relation value = 0 }
					}
				}
				cardinal9 = {
					clr_province_flag = cardinal9
					REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal9_active }
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						if = {
							limit = {  NOT = { tag = ROOT } check_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 68 }}
							country_event = { id = vef_papacy.7 days = 1 }
						}

					}
				}
				cardinal10 = {

						}

					}
				}
				cardinal11 = {

# New Cardinal Appointed
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2
	title = vef_papacy.2.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		religion = catholic
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
		OR = {
			NOT = { REB = { check_variable = { which = vef_college_size which = vef_college_maximum }}}
			FROM = { tag = PAP }
		}
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = ruler_excommunicated }
		NOT = { has_country_modifier = under_interdict }
		any_owned_province = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			NOT = { area = central_italy_area }
		}
		NOT = { tag = PAP }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 1200
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.25
			capital_scope = { region = italy_region }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.7
			capital_scope = { region = france_region }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			reverse_has_opinion = { who = PAP value = 75 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.33
			reverse_has_opinion = { who = PAP value = 150 }
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.75
			prestige = 25
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.66
			prestige = 50
		}
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			prestige = 75
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		custom_tooltip = new_cardinal
		hidden_effect = {
			REB = {
				change_variable = { which = vef_college_size value = 1 }
				change_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = 0.66 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { region = france_region }
				OR = {
					government = republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }
					province_event = { id = vef_papacy.6 days = 100 }
					set_province_flag = french_cardinal
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals value = 1 }}
					set_province_flag = new_cardinal
					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }
					if = {
						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = french_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}

						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}
						set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 65 }}

						add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_present duration = -1 }

							set_variable = { which = cardinal20_relation value = 40 }
							if = {
								limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal20_relation value = 10 }
							}
						}
						owner = {
							change_variable = { which = cardinal20_relation value = 20 }
							every_known_country = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									OR = {
										war_with = PREV
										is_rival = PREV
										has_opinion_modifier = { modifier = had_war_with_us who = PREV }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal20_relation value = -20 }
							}
						}

		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }

					government = republic

						government = monarchy

						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }

				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic

						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }

					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }

						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal

					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}

					}
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 65 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }}

		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }
				OR = {
					government = republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }
					province_event = { id = vef_papacy.6 days = 100 }
					set_province_flag = british_cardinal
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals value = 1 }}
					set_province_flag = new_cardinal
					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }
					if = {
						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = british_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}

							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal22_active }}
							NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }

							if = {
								limit = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal22_relation value = 10 }
							}

							every_known_country = {

										war_with = PREV
										is_rival = PREV

									}

						area = liguria_area
						area = emilia_area

					government = republic

						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }

					add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }

					set_province_flag = northitalian_cardinal
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals value = 1 }}
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = 1 }}

						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}

						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal

					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}

							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal17_active }}
							NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						}
						set_province_flag = cardinal17
						REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal17_active }
						add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_present duration = -1 }
						every_country = {
							limit = { religion = catholic }
							set_variable = { which = cardinal17_relation value = 40 }
							if = {
								limit = {
									capital_scope = {
										#province_group = two_sicilies_group
										OR = {
											area = sicily_area
											area = calabria_area
											area = apulia_area
											area = naples_area
										}
									}
									NOT = { has_reform = medici_republic }
									OR = {
										government = republic
										AND = {
											government = monarchy
											NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
											NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
											NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal17_relation value = 10 }
							}
						}
						owner = {
							change_variable = { which = cardinal17_relation value = 20 }
							every_known_country = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									OR = {
										war_with = PREV
										is_rival = PREV
										has_opinion_modifier = { modifier = had_war_with_us who = PREV }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal17_relation value = -20 }
							}

		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = medici_republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "de Medici"
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }
					}

								limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
				NOT = {
					capital_scope = {
						#province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group

							area = romagna_area
							area = tuscany_area
							area = liguria_area
							area = emilia_area
							area = venetia_area
							area = piedmont_area
							area = lombardy_area
							area = aquileia_area
						}
					}
				}

					NOT = { government = monarchy }
					AND = {

						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}

				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						NOT = { area = central_italy_area }

					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }

						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}

						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal

					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}
						set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}

						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}

							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal9_active }}
							NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						}
						set_province_flag = cardinal9
						REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal9_active }
						add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_present duration = -1 }
						every_country = {
							limit = { religion = catholic }
							set_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 40 }
							if = {
								limit = { culture_group = ROOT }
								change_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 10 }
							}
						}
						owner = {
							change_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 20 }
							every_known_country = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									OR = {
										war_with = PREV
										is_rival = PREV
										has_opinion_modifier = { modifier = had_war_with_us who = PREV }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = -20 }
							}
						}

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2.opta"
		add_prestige = 5
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = new_cardinal }
			clr_province_flag = new_cardinal
		}
	}
}

# New Cardinal Appointed - Seat
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.3
	title = vef_papacy.3.t
	desc = vef_papacy.3.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		custom_tooltip = new_cardinal_seat
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_college_size value = 1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = 0.66 }}
		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { region = france_region }
				OR = {
					government = republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }
					province_event = { id = vef_papacy.6 days = 100 }
					set_province_flag = french_cardinal
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals value = 1 }}
					set_province_flag = new_cardinal
					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }
					if = {
						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = french_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}
						set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					random_list = {
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 65 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_active }}}
						REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal1_active }
						set_province_flag = cardinal1
						add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_present duration = -1 }
						every_country = {
							limit = { religion = catholic }
							set_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 40 }
							if = {
								limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 10 }
							}
						}
						owner = {
							change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 20 }
							every_known_country = {
								limit = {
									religion = catholic
									OR = {
										war_with = PREV
										is_rival = PREV
										has_opinion_modifier = { modifier = had_war_with_us who = PREV }
									}
								}
								change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = -20 }
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_active }}
							NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
						}
						set_province_flag = cardinal2
						REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal2_active }
						add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_present duration = -1 }
						every_country = {

				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {

						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }

						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }}

		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }
				OR = {
					government = republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
					}
					add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }
					province_event = { id = vef_papacy.6 days = 100 }
					set_province_flag = british_cardinal
					REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals value = 1 }}
					set_province_flag = new_cardinal
					set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 25 }
					if = {
						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = british_pope }}
						change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 10 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}

		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					has_reform = medici_republic
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "de Medici"
					}
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = {
				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
					}

							change_variable = { which = cardinal19_relation value = 20 }
							every_known_country = {
								limit = {

		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }}
				NOT = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
				NOT = { 
					capital_scope = {
						#province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group
						OR = {
							area = romagna_area
							area = tuscany_area
							area = liguria_area
							area = emilia_area
							area = venetia_area
							area = piedmont_area
							area = lombardy_area
							area = aquileia_area
						}
					}
				}
				OR = {
					NOT = { government = monarchy }
					AND = { 
						NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
						NOT = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
					}
				}
			}

				random_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }

						limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_pope }}

						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
					if = {
						limit = { owner = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }}
						set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}

						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
						20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}

	option = { #A pious man
		name = "vef_papacy.3.opta"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 10 }
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = new_cardinal }
			clr_province_flag = new_cardinal
		}
	}
	
	option = { #A political choice
		name = "vef_papacy.3.optb"
		add_adm_power = 25
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = new_cardinal }
			clr_province_flag = new_cardinal
		}
	}
	
	option = { #A family member
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
			OR = {
				has_country_modifier = papal_sponsor
				has_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
				reverse_has_opinion = { who = PAP value = 180 }
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.3.optc"
		custom_tooltip = family_cardinal
		hidden_effect = {
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = new_cardinal }
				clr_province_flag = new_cardinal
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_flag
					cardinal1 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal2 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal3 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal4 = {

					}
					cardinal13 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal13_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal14 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal15 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal15_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal16 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal16_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal17 = {
						ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal17_relation value = 15 }}
					}
					cardinal18 = {

					cardinal19 = {

					cardinal30 = {

	}
	
	option = { #A young man
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_modifier = papal_sponsor
				has_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
				reverse_has_opinion = { who = PAP value = 180 }
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.3.optd"
		custom_tooltip = young_cardinal
		hidden_effect = {
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = new_cardinal }
				clr_province_flag = new_cardinal
				random_list = {
					10 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 13 }}
					20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 16 }}
					30 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 20 }}
					40 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 25 }}
				}
				set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 15 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Too Few Roman Cardinals
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.4
	title = vef_papacy.4.t
	desc = vef_papacy.4.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
		
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		NOT = { REB = { check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals value = 3 }}}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 12 }	
	
	
	option = {	# Appoint one
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.4.opta"
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = 1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals value = 1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_college_size value = 1 }}
		REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = 0.66 }}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism }
				AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 } }
			}
			random_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = central_italy_area
						owned_by = PAP
					}
					NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				}
				add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_diocese duration = -1 }
				set_province_flag = roman_cardinal
				random_list = {
					20 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 45 }}
					35 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 50 }}
					30 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 60 }}
					10 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }}
					5 = { set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 80 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_active }}}
					REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal1_active }
					set_province_flag = cardinal1
					set_province_flag = cardinal_rome
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						set_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 40 }
						if = {
							limit = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}
							change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 10 }
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_active }}
						NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
					}
					REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal2_active }
					set_province_flag = cardinal2
					set_province_flag = cardinal_rome
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						set_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 40 }

							limit = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}

						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal3_active }}
						NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
					}
					REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal3_active }

							limit = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}

					}
				}
				if = {

					}
				}

					}

						NOT = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
					}
					REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal30_active }
					set_province_flag = cardinal30
					set_province_flag = cardinal_rome
					every_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic }
						set_variable = { which = cardinal30_relation value = 40 }
						if = {
							limit = { capital_scope = { region = italy_region }}
							change_variable = { which = cardinal30_relation value = 10 }
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}	
	}
	
	option = {	# No, the Roman families have too much influence
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.4.optb"
		add_republican_tradition = -10
	}
}

# Too Few French Cardinals
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.5
	title = vef_papacy.5.t
	desc = vef_papacy.5.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_ruler_flag = yield_to_france
		NOT = { REB = { check_variable =  { which = vef_french_cardinals value = 7 }}}
		NOT = { is_year = 1360 }
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 2 }

	immediate = {
		random_country = {
			limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
		}
	}

	option = {	# Very Well
		name = "vef_papacy.5.opta"
	}
}

# Cardinal Decides Where to Go
province_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.6
	title = vef_papacy.6.t
	desc = vef_papacy.6.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
	
	option = {	# To Rome
		ai_chance = { factor = 70 }
		name = "vef_papacy.6.opta"
		set_province_flag = cardinal_rome
		remove_province_modifier = cardinal_present
	}
	
	option = {	#To Court
		trigger = { owner = { religion = catholic }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				owner = { has_country_modifier = cardinal_court }
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.6.opta"
		set_province_flag = cardinal_court
		remove_province_modifier = cardinal_present
		owner = { add_country_modifier = { name = cardinal_court duration = -1 }}
	}
	
	option = {	#Stay Here
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 5
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }
				factor = 10
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.6.opta"
	}
}

# Notification of Cardinal Death
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.7
	title = vef_papacy.7.t
	desc = vef_papacy.7.d
	picture = VEF_DEATH_OF_HEIR_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.7.opta"
	}
}

# New Pope - Do we keep French Influence
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.8
	title = vef_papacy.8.t
	desc = vef_papacy.8.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes #vef_papacy.101.opta

	option = {	# Very Well
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.8.opta"
		set_ruler_flag = yield_to_france
	}
	
	option = {	# Drop Dead
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.8.optb"
		reverse_add_opinion = {
			who = FRA
			modifier = pope_rejected_france
		}
		set_country_flag = rejected_france
	}
}


##################
# Cardinal Seats #
##################

# Generic Removal
province_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.85
	title = vef_papacy.85.t
	desc = vef_papacy.85.d

	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	trigger = {
		has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
		OR = {
			NOT = { religion = catholic }
			owned_by = PAP
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.85.opta"
		remove_province_modifier = cardinal_seat
		set_province_flag = former_cardinal_seat
	}
}

# Seat Returns
province_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.86
	title = vef_papacy.86.t
	desc = vef_papacy.86.d

	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	trigger = {
		has_province_flag = seat_refresh
		religion = catholic
		NOT = { owned_by = PAP }
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.6.opta"
		add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = cardinal_seat duration = -1 }
		clr_province_flag = former_cardinal_seat
	}
}

# Valencia
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.87
	title = vef_papacy.87.t
	desc = vef_papacy.87.d
	
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		owns = 103
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		is_year = 1430
		religion = catholic
		103 = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
		}
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 60
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.87.opta"
		103 = {
			add_permanent_province_modifier = {
				name = cardinal_seat
				duration = -1
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }}
				owner = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.3 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Castillan/Spanish Idea - Capital
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.96
	title = vef_papacy.96.t
	desc = vef_papacy.96.d
	
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = CAS
			tag = SPA
		}
		religion = catholic
		has_idea = devout_catholisism
		capital_scope = { NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.96.opta"
		capital_scope = {
			add_permanent_province_modifier = {
				name = cardinal_seat
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.3 days = 3 }
	}
}

# Generic Catholic Ideas - Capital
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.97
	title = vef_papacy.97.t
	desc = vef_papacy.97.d
	
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		ai = no
		religion = catholic
		full_idea_group = religious_ideas
		NOT = { has_country_flag = ideas_cardinal }
		NOT = { government = papal_government }
		any_owned_province = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
		}
	}
	
	immediate = { set_country_flag = ideas_cardinal }
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.97.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { capital_scope = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }}
			random_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
					NOT = { province_id = 103 }
					NOT = { province_id = 96 }
					NOT = { province_id = 63 }
					NOT = { province_id = 22 }
					NOT = { province_id = 175 }
					NOT = { province_id = 130 }
					NOT = { province_id = 333 }
					NOT = { province_id = 298 }
					NOT = { province_id = 114 }
				}
				add_permanent_province_modifier = {
					name = cardinal_seat
					duration = -1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				capital_scope = {
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
					NOT = { province_id = 103 }
					NOT = { province_id = 96 }
					NOT = { province_id = 63 }
					NOT = { province_id = 22 }
					NOT = { province_id = 175 }
					NOT = { province_id = 130 }
					NOT = { province_id = 333 }
					NOT = { province_id = 298 }
					NOT = { province_id = 114 }
				}
			}
			capital_scope = {
				add_permanent_province_modifier = {
					name = cardinal_seat
					duration = -1
				}
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.3 days = 3 }
	}
}

#####################
# Cardinal Routines #
#####################

# Calculate Schism Majority
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.98
	title = vef_papacy.98.t
	desc = vef_papacy.98.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = AVI
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_prorome_cardinals }
		change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_proavignon_cardinals }
		multiply_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0.8 }
	}
	
	option = { 
		name = "vef_papacy.98.opta"
	}
}

# Cardinals Age
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.99
	title = vef_papacy.99.t
	desc = vef_papacy.99.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_modifier = cardinals_aged }}
		ai = yes
	}
	
	immediate = {
		REB = { add_country_modifier = { name = cardinals_aged duration = 360 }}
		change_variable = { which = papal_age value = 1 }
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				change_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 1 }
				random_list = {
					20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = -3 }}
					20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = -1 }}
					20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }}
					20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 2 }}
					20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 3 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 30 }}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 30 }}}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 30 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }
							has_province_modifier = cardinal_present
						}
						set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
						random_list = {
							20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }}
							20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 2 }}
							20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 3 }}
							20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 4 }}
							20 = { change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 5 }}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = { 
		name = "vef_papacy.99.opta"
	}
}


#############
# Elections #
#############

# Pope has died; Avignon Papacy
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.100
	title = vef_papacy.100.t
	desc = vef_papacy.100.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		government = papal_government
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_initial
	}
	
	immediate = {
		define_ruler = {
			name = "Sede"
			dynasty = "Vacante"
			adm = 2
			dip = 0
			mil = 0
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				multiply_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0.75 }
			}
			clr_country_flag = french_pope
			if = {
				limit = {
					REB = { check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_italian_cardinals }}
				}
				set_country_flag = french_clear_election
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					REB = { check_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }}
				}
				set_country_flag = italian_clear_election
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.100.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.101 days = 60 }
	}
}

# Conclave over; Avignon Papacy
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.101
	title = vef_papacy.101.t
	desc = vef_papacy.101.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = french_clear_election
				NOT = { is_year = 1360 }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 90 }
		name = "vef_papacy.101.opta"
		define_ruler = {}
		clr_country_flag = french_clear_election
		clr_country_flag = italian_clear_election
		set_country_flag = french_pope
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { is_year = 1360 }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = rejected_france }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.8 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				has_country_flag = italian_clear_election
				is_year = 1360
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		name = "vef_papacy.101.optb"
		define_ruler = {}
		set_country_flag = roman_pope
		clr_country_flag = italian_clear_election
		clr_country_flag = french_clear_election
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.200 days = 180 }
		hidden_effect = { every_country = { remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium }}
	}
}

#Elections during schism
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.102
	title = vef_papacy.102.t
	desc = vef_papacy.102.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		government = papal_government
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.102.opta"
		define_ruler = {}	
	}
}

# Post-Schism Elections
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.103
	title = vef_papacy.103.t
	desc = vef_papacy.103.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		OR = {	
			tag = REB
			AND = {
				government = papal_government
				has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
				has_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { tag = PAP }
				define_ruler = {
					name = "Sede"
					dynasty = "Vacante"
					adm = 2
					dip = 0
					mil = 0
				}
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				multiply_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0.75 }
			}
			every_country = {
				remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
				remove_country_modifier = papal_sponsor
				clr_country_flag = support_decided
				clr_country_flag = cardinal1_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal2_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal3_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal4_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal5_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal6_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal7_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal8_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal9_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal10_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal11_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal12_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal13_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal14_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal15_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal16_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal17_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal18_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal19_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal20_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal21_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal22_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal23_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal24_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal25_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal26_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal27_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal28_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal29_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal30_support
				clr_country_flag = cardinal1_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal2_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal3_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal4_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal5_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal6_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal7_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal8_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal9_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal10_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal11_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal12_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal13_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal14_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal15_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal16_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal17_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal18_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal19_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal20_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal21_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal22_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal23_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal24_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal25_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal26_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal27_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal28_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal29_money
				clr_country_flag = cardinal30_money
			}
			REB = {
				set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = scrutiny_count value = 0 }
				clr_country_flag = candidate1_assigned
				clr_country_flag = candidate2_assigned
				clr_country_flag = candidate3_assigned
				clr_country_flag = candidate4_assigned
				clr_country_flag = candidate5_assigned
			}
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				clr_province_flag = novote
				clr_province_flag = small_investment
				clr_province_flag = large_investment
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
					random = {
						chance = 20
						set_province_flag = novote
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_court }
					random = {
						chance = 10
						set_province_flag = novote
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
					if = {
						limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = candidate1_assigned }}}
						set_province_flag = papal_candidate
						set_province_flag = pap_1candidate
						REB = { set_country_flag = candidate1_assigned }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = candidate2_assigned }}
						}
						set_province_flag = papal_candidate
						set_province_flag = pap_2candidate
						REB = { set_country_flag = candidate2_assigned }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = candidate3_assigned }}
						}
						set_province_flag = papal_candidate
						set_province_flag = pap_3candidate
						REB = { set_country_flag = candidate3_assigned }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = candidate4_assigned }}
						}
						set_province_flag = papal_candidate
						set_province_flag = pap_4candidate
						REB = { set_country_flag = candidate4_assigned }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
							NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = candidate5_assigned }}
						}
						set_province_flag = papal_candidate
						set_province_flag = pap_5candidate
						REB = { set_country_flag = candidate5_assigned }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = french_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = french_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = french_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = french_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = french_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = spanish_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = spanish_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = spanish_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = spanish_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = spanish_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = british_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = british_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = british_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = british_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = british_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = ultramontane_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = ultramontane_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = ultramontane_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = roman_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = roman_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = roman_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = roman_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = roman_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = northitalian_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = northitalian_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = northitalian_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = northitalian_candidate }}}

							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = sforza_cardinal }
							if = {
								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = sforza_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = sforza_divide }
							}
							if = {
								limit = { NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = sforza_candidate }}}
								REB = { set_country_flag = sforza_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = este_cardinal }

								limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = este_candidate }}
								REB = { set_country_flag = este_divide }

							if = {

								REB = { set_country_flag = este_candidate }
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 }
							random_country = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 68 }
									NOT = { tag = PAP }
								}
								set_country_flag = cardinal1_support
								REB = { set_country_flag = wait_1cardinal }

	}

}

# Post-Schism Elections - Country Support
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.104
	title = vef_papacy.104.t
	desc = vef_papacy.104.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = support_decided }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		set_country_flag = support_decided
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_support }
		name = "vef_papacy.104.opta"
		set_variable = { which = loyalty_display which = cardinal1_relation }
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
		}
		set_country_flag = cardinal1_money
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.105 days = 1 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_support }

# Post-Schism Elections - Investment
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.105
	title = vef_papacy.105.t
	desc = vef_papacy.105.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {	#Small Investment
		name = "vef_papacy.105.opta"
		add_years_of_income = -0.1
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal1_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal2_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal3_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal3_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal4_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal4_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal5_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal5_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal6_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal6_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal7_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal7_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal8_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal8_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal9_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal9_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal10_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal10_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal11_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal11_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal12_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal12_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal13_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal13_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal14_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal14_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal15_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal15_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal16_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal16_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal17_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal17_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal18_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal18_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal19_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal19_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal20_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal20_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal21_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal21_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal22_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal22_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal23_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal23_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal24_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal24_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal25_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal25_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal26_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal26_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal27_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal27_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal28_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal28_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal29_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal29_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal30_money }
				REB = { set_country_flag = cardinal30_moneys }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal1_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_1cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal2_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_2cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal3_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal3_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_3cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal4_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal4_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_4cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal5_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal5_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_5cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal6_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal6_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_6cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal7_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal7_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_7cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal8_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal8_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_8cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal9_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal9_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_9cardinal }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal10_support }
				clr_country_flag = cardinal10_support
				REB = { clr_country_flag = wait_10cardinal }
			}
			if = {

# Post-Schism Elections - First scrutiny
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.106
	title = vef_papacy.106.t
	desc = vef_papacy.106.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_1cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_2cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_3cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_4cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_5cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_6cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_7cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_8cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_9cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_10cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_11cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_12cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_13cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_14cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_15cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_16cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_17cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_18cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_19cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_20cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_21cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_22cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_23cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_24cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_25cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_26cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_27cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_28cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_29cardinal }
		NOT = { has_country_flag = wait_30cardinal }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_moneyl }
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 }
				set_province_flag = large_investment
			}
			clr_country_flag = cardinal1_moneyl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_moneyl }
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 }

		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal3_moneyl }

		}

			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal4_moneyl }
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal4 }
				set_province_flag = large_investment
			}
			clr_country_flag = cardinal4_moneyl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal5_moneyl }
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal5 }
				set_province_flag = large_investment
			}
			clr_country_flag = cardinal5_moneyl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal6_moneyl }
			every_province = {

				set_province_flag = large_investment

			clr_country_flag = cardinal6_moneyl
		}
		if = {

			}
			clr_country_flag = cardinal7_moneyl
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal8_moneyl }
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal8 }
				set_province_flag = large_investment
			}
			clr_country_flag = cardinal8_moneyl
		}
		if = {

	option = {
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
				NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				NOT = { has_province_flag = novote }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_5pull }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_1votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_2votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_3votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_4votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_4pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_5votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = pap_1votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = pap_1candidate }
				set_province_flag = elected_pope
			}

		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = pap_2votes which = vef_required_majority }}

						NOT = { has_province_flag = small_investment }

							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = 2 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_1candidate
						has_province_flag = small_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = -1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_1pull value = 3 }}
						}
					}

					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						change_variable = { which = candidate_2pull value = 2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_3candidate
						NOT = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = -2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 2 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_3candidate
						has_province_flag = small_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = -1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 3 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_3candidate
						has_province_flag = large_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 3 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 4 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_3candidate
						check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 85 }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						change_variable = { which = candidate_3pull value = 2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_4candidate
						NOT = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = -2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 2 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_4candidate
						has_province_flag = small_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = -1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 3 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_4candidate
						has_province_flag = large_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 3 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 4 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_4candidate
						check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 85 }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						change_variable = { which = candidate_4pull value = 2 }
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
						NOT = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
						NOT = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = -2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
						has_province_flag = small_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = -1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 1 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 3 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
						has_province_flag = large_investment
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						random_list = {
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 0 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 3 }}
							25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 4 }}
						}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
						check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 85 }
					}
					every_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.107 days = 10 }
		}
	}
}

# Post-Schism Elections - Succeeding Scrutinies
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.107
	title = vef_papacy.107.t
	desc = vef_papacy.107.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		change_variable = { which = scrutiny_count value = 1 }
		every_province = {
			limit = {
				has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
				NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				NOT = { has_province_flag = novote }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_1pull which = candidate_5pull }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_1votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_2pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_2votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_4pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_3pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_3votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_4pull which = candidate_5pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_4votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_1pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_2pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_3pull }
					check_variable = { which = candidate_5pull which = candidate_4pull }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = pap_vote_cast }
				}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = pap_5votes value = 1 }}
				set_province_flag = pap_vote_cast
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { check_variable = { which = pap_1votes which = vef_required_majority }}
		name = "vef_papacy.107.opta"
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = pap_1candidate }
			set_province_flag = elected_pope
		}
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.108 days = 30 }
	}

					}
				}

				}
