			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
					NOT = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
					NOT = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
				}
				every_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					random_list = {
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = -2 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 0 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 1 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
					has_province_flag = small_investment
				}
				every_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					random_list = {
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = -1 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 1 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 3 }}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
					has_province_flag = large_investment
				}
				every_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					random_list = {
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 0 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 3 }}
						25 = { change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 4 }}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_province_flag = pap_5candidate
					check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 85 }
				}
				every_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					change_variable = { which = candidate_5pull value = 2 }
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = scrutiny_count value = 7 }}}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.107 days = 10 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = scrutiny_count value = 7 }}
			random_province = {
				limit = {
					has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
					check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 70 }
				}
				set_province_flag = papal_candidate
				set_province_flag = elected_pope
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.108 days = 10 }
		}
	}
}

# Post-Schism Elections - Pope Elected
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.108
	title = vef_papacy.108.t
	desc = vef_papacy.108.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	immediate = {
		random_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = elected_pope }
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 30 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 31 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 32 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 33 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 34 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 35 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 36 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 37 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}
			}

				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}

				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { is_variable_equal = { which = cardinal_age value = 79 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 80 }}
				REB = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}
			}
			owner = { change_variable = { which = vef_our_cardinals value = -1 }}
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_college_size value = -1 }}
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = -0.66 }}
			remove_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
				remove_province_modifier = cardinal_present
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_court }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal_court
				owner = { remove_country_modifier = cardinal_court }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal_rome
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = french_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = french_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = french_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = french_pope
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.116 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = spanish_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = spanish_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = spanish_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = spanish_pope
					if = {
						limit = {
							OR = {
								NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
								is_year = 1550
								has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
							}
						}
						country_event = { id = vef_papacy.117 days = 1 }
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							is_year = 1450
							NOT = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
							NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
						}
						country_event = { id = vef_papacy.118 days = 1 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = british_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = british_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = british_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = british_pope
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.119 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {

				REB = { set_country_flag = medici_pope }
				PAP = {

					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.123 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = neopolitan_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = neopolitan_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }
				PAP = {

				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = sforza_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_italian_cardinals value = -1 }}
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = sforza_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = sforza_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = sforza_pope
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.124 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {

				}
			}

				REB = { set_country_flag = este_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = este_pope
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.125 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = roman_cardinal }
				REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals value = -1 }}
				clr_province_flag = roman_cardinal
				REB = { set_country_flag = roman_pope }
				PAP = {
					set_country_flag = roman_pope
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.120 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal1
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal1_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 68 }}
						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal2
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal2_active }

						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}

					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal3 }

						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {

						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 0 }

			}
			if = {

					if = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal5 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal5
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal5_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {

						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal5_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal5_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal6 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal6
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal6_active }
				every_country = {

					}
					if = {

						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal6_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal6_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal7 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal7
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal7_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal7_relation value = 68 }}
						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal7_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal7_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal8 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal8
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal8_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal8_relation value = 68 }}
						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal8_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal8_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal9 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal9
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal9_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 68 }}
						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = cardinal9_money }
						add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
					}
					set_variable = { which = cardinal9_relation value = 0 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal10 }
				clr_province_flag = cardinal10
				REB = { clr_country_flag = cardinal10_active }
				every_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { tag = PAP }
					}
					if = {
						limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal10_relation value = 68 }}
						reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = friendly_pope }
					}

				}
			}
			clr_province_flag = papal_candidate
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_flag = papal_candidate }
			clr_province_flag = papal_candidate
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = pap_1candidate }
				clr_province_flag = pap_1candidate
			}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = pap_4candidate }
				clr_province_flag = pap_4candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_province_flag = pap_5candidate }
				clr_province_flag = pap_5candidate
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.108.opta"
	}
}

# Endgame Elections
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.109
	title = vef_papacy.109.t
	desc = vef_papacy.109.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { 
		government = papal_government
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame
	}
	
	immediate = {
		define_ruler = {
			name = "Sede"
			dynasty = "Vacante"
			adm = 2
			dip = 0
			mil = 0
			regency = yes
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = { religion = catholic }
			multiply_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0.75 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.109.opta"
		hidden_effect = {
			REB = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.110 days = 1 }}
		}
	}
}

# Endgame Elections
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.110
	title = vef_papacy.110.t
	desc = vef_papacy.110.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
				remove_country_modifier = papal_sponsor
				clr_country_flag = spent_french_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_spanish_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_northitalian_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_neopolitan_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_medici_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_sforza_money
				clr_country_flag = spent_este_money
			}
			REB = {
				set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0 }
				clr_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				clr_country_flag = french_pope
				clr_country_flag = british_pope
				clr_country_flag = ultramontane_pope
				clr_country_flag = roman_pope
				clr_country_flag = neopolitan_pope
				clr_country_flag = northitalian_pope
				clr_country_flag = spanish_pope
				clr_country_flag = borgia_pope
				clr_country_flag = medici_pope
				clr_country_flag = sforza_pope
				clr_country_flag = este_pope
				clr_country_flag = dellarovere_pope
				clr_country_flag = french1_money
				clr_country_flag = french2_money
				clr_country_flag = spanish11_money
				clr_country_flag = spanish22_money
				clr_country_flag = northitalian1_money
				clr_country_flag = northitalian2_money
				clr_country_flag = neopolitan1_money
				clr_country_flag = neopolitan2_money
				clr_country_flag = medici1_money
				clr_country_flag = medici2_money
				clr_country_flag = sforza1_money
				clr_country_flag = sforza2_money
				clr_country_flag = este1_money
				clr_country_flag = este2_money
				clr_country_flag = pap_french_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_spanish_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_roman_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_northitalian_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_medici_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_sforza_preference
				clr_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				clr_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				set_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = 0 }
			}
			PAP = {
				clr_country_flag = french_pope
				clr_country_flag = british_pope
				clr_country_flag = ultramontane_pope
				clr_country_flag = roman_pope
				clr_country_flag = neopolitan_pope
				clr_country_flag = northitalian_pope
				clr_country_flag = spanish_pope
				clr_country_flag = borgia_pope
				clr_country_flag = medici_pope
				clr_country_flag = sforza_pope
				clr_country_flag = este_pope
				clr_country_flag = dellarovere_pope
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = french_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = spanish_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = british_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = ultramontane_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = roman_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = neopolitan_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = northitalian_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = medici_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = sforza_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_required_majority }
				}
				set_country_flag = este_clear_election
				set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.111 days = 30 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# French hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Spanish hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate

			if = {
				limit = { exists = IBE }
				IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					exists = SPA
					SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
				}
				SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {

					NOT = { exists = SPA }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
				}
				CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}

					NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
				}
				NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Romans hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Neopolitans hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = SCL }
				SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = SCL }
					NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
				}
				NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = SCL }
					NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
				}
				SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# North Italians hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = VEN
					exists = GEN
				}
				random_list = {
					50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = VEN
					NOT = { exists = GEN }
				}
				VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = GEN
					NOT = { exists = VEN }
				}
				GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Medici hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { exists = TUS }
				TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
				FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Sforza hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			random_country = {
				limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
