					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_este_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Este hold most cardinals
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
			check_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.110.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.113 days = 40 }
		set_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
		hidden_effect = {
			random_country = {
				limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					NOT = { FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }}
				}
				BUR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
			}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = IBE }
					IBE = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						exists = SPA
						SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					}
					SPA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					CAS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NOT = { exists = SPA }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					ARA = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
						POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
					}
					POR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = IBE }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = SPA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
						NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					}
					NAV = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = SCL }
					SCL = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
					}
					NAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = { exists = SCL }
						NOT = { NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }}
					}
					SIC = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						exists = GEN
					}
					random_list = {
						50 = { VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
						50 = { GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}}
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = VEN
						NOT = { exists = GEN }
					}
					VEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						exists = GEN
						NOT = { exists = VEN }
					}
					GEN = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				if = {
					limit = { exists = TUS }
					TUS = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { exists = TUS }}
					FLR = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_roman_cardinals which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_british_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_french_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_roman_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
					check_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals which = vef_medici_cardinals }
				}
				set_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.112 days = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

# Post-Schism Elections - Clear Majority
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.111
	title = vef_papacy.111.t
	desc = vef_papacy.111.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_country = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				multiply_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0.1 }
				multiply_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.1 }
				multiply_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0.1 }
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0 }}
				}
					set_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 0 }
			}
		}
	}

	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = french_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = french_clear_election
		set_country_flag = french_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.116 days = 7 }}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = spanish_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = spanish_clear_election
		set_country_flag = spanish_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.117 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = british_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = british_clear_election
		set_country_flag = british_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.119 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = ultramontane_clear_election
		set_country_flag = ultramontane_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.126 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = roman_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = roman_clear_election
		set_country_flag = roman_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.120 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = neopolitan_clear_election
		set_country_flag = neopolitan_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.122 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = northitalian_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = northitalian_clear_election
		set_country_flag = northitalian_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.121 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = medici_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = medici_clear_election
		set_country_flag = medici_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.123 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = sforza_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = sforza_clear_election
		set_country_flag = sforza_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.124 days = 7 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = este_clear_election }
		name = "vef_papacy.111.opta"
		clr_country_flag = este_clear_election
		set_country_flag = este_pope
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.125 days = 7 }}
	}
}

# Option to financially influence Papal Elections
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.112
	title = vef_papacy.112.t
	desc = vef_papacy.112.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
		NOT = { is_year = 1800 }
	}
	
	option = {	# 10% year's income for chance of 0,1,2
		name = "vef_papacy.112.opta"
		add_years_of_income = -0.1
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = FRA
					tag = BUR
					tag = ANV
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = french1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_french_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = SPA
					tag = CAS
					tag = NAV
					tag = ARA
					tag = POR
					tag = IBE
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = spanish1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_spanish_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = VEN
					tag = GEN
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = northitalian1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_northitalian_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = NAP
					tag = SIC
					tag = SCL
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = neopolitan1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_neopolitan_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = FLR
					tag = TUS
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = medici1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_medici_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				government = monarchy
				dynasty = "Sforza"
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = sforza1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_sforza_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				government = monarchy
				dynasty = "d'Este"
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = este1_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_este_money
		}
	}
	
	option = {  # 20% year's income for chance of 1,2,3
		name = "vef_papacy.112.optb"
		add_years_of_income = -0.2
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = FRA
					tag = BUR
					tag = ANV
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = french2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_french_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = SPA
					tag = CAS
					tag = NAV
					tag = ARA
					tag = POR
					tag = IBE
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = spanish2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_spanish_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = VEN
					tag = GEN
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = northitalian2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_northitalian_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = NAP
					tag = SIC
					tag = SCL
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = neopolitan2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_neopolitan_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				OR = {
					tag = FLR
					tag = TUS
				}
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = medici2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_medici_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				government = monarchy
				dynasty = "Sforza"
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = sforza2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_sforza_money
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				government = monarchy
				dynasty = "d'Este"
			}
			REB = { set_country_flag = este2_money }
			set_country_flag = spent_este_money
		}
	}
	
	option = {  # Nothing
		name = "vef_papacy.112.optc"
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}

# Conclave in Progress
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.113
	title = vef_papacy.113.t
	desc = vef_papacy.113.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
	
	immediate = {	# All votes go preferentially to self
		hidden_effect = { # French Votes go to Medici, Borgia, Roman, Spain (not della Rovere; not at war; not rivals), Never to Naples, Sforza or Northern Italy
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
					NOT = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
					is_year = 1450
					NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
					}
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
					NOT = { FRA = { war_with = SPA }}
					OR = {
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
					}
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
						FRA = { war_with = SPA }
					}
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_french_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Spanish votes go to Northern Italy, Roman, Medici ( with Medici Bank )
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
					#SPA = { has_country_modifier = medici_bank }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
						# NOT = { SPA = { has_country_modifier = medici_bank }}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_spanish_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Roman votes go to Neopolitans, Northern Italian, Medici, d'Este
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_roman_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # North Italian votes go to Spanish, Medici, Roman, d'Este
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_northitalian_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Neopolitan votes go to Spanish, Sforza, Medici, North Italian
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Medici to to Sforza, French, Roman
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_medici_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Sforza to to della Rovere, Medici, Roman
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
					NOT = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
					NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
					is_year = 1450
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
					}
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
					}
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					OR = {
						NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
					}
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_sforza_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # d'Este to to Medici, Roman, Sforza
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
				change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = vef_este_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_este_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_este_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_este_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_este_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # Ultramontane to to Roman, Spanish, Neopolitan
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { # British to to Roman, Spanish, NorthItalian
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_british_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_british_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_british_cardinals }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }
				}
				change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes which = vef_british_cardinals }
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = french1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spanish1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = northitalian1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = neopolitan1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = medici1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = sforza1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = este1_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes value = 1 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes value = 2 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = french2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 1 }
					}
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_french_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spanish2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 1 }
					} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = northitalian2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 1 }
					} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = neopolitan2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 1 }
					} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = medici2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 1 }
					}
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = sforza2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 1 }
					} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = este2_money }
				random_list = {
					20 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -1 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes value = 1 }
					} 
					70 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -2 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes value = 2 }
					}
					10 = {
						change_variable = { which = pap_undecided_votes value = -3 }
						change_variable = { which = pap_este_votes value = 3 }
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.113.opta"
		if = {
			limit = {
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			NOT = { check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { ai = no }}
				PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.114 days = 20 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { ai = yes }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.115 days = 20 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = vef_required_majority }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.120 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.121 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.123 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						NOT = { is_year = 1450 }
						is_year = 1550
						has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.117 days = 20 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_year = 1450
					NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.118 days = 20 }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.116 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.122 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.124 days = 20 }
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = vef_required_majority }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.125 days = 20 }
		}
	}
}

# Conclave in Progress - No Majority
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.114
	title = vef_papacy.114.t
	desc = vef_papacy.114.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_french_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.116 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_spanish_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.optb"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.117 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_roman_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.optc"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.120 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_northitalian_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.optd"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.121 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_neopolitan_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.opte"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.122 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_medici_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.optf"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.123 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_sforza_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.optg"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.124 days = 20 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = pap_este_candidate }}
		name = "vef_papacy.114.opth"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.125 days = 20 }
		}
	}	
}

# Conclave in Progress - No Majority; AI Only
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.115
	title = vef_papacy.115.t
	desc = vef_papacy.115.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.115.optb"
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_roman_votes which = pap_este_votes }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = roman_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.120 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_northitalian_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = northitalian_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.121 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_medici_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = medici_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.123 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_spanish_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = spanish_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						is_year = 1550
						PAP = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
					}
				}
				PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.117 days = 5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
					NOT = { PAP = { has_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }}
				}
				set_country_flag = borgia_pope
				PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.118 days = 5 }}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_french_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = french_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.116 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_neopolitan_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = neopolitan_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.122 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_sforza_votes which = pap_este_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_clear_election
			set_country_flag = sforza_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.124 days = 5 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_roman_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_northitalian_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_spanish_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_french_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_neopolitan_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_medici_votes }
				check_variable = { which = pap_este_votes which = pap_sforza_votes }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_clear_election }
			}
			set_country_flag = este_pope
			random_list = {
				10 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}
				30 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}
				20 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}
				15 = { set_variable = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}
			}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.125 days = 5 }}
		}
	}
}

# French Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.116
	title = vef_papacy.116.t
	desc = vef_papacy.116.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.116.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = french_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_french_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 52 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 53 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 54 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 55 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 56 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 56 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 57 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 57 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 58 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 58 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 59 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 59 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 60 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 61 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 62 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 62 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 63 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 64 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Spanish Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.117
	title = vef_papacy.117.t
	desc = vef_papacy.117.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.117.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = spanish_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_spanish_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 52 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 53 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 54 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 55 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 56 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 56 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 57 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 57 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 58 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 58 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 59 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 59 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 60 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 61 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 62 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 62 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 63 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 64 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Borgia Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.118
	title = vef_papacy.118.t
	desc = vef_papacy.118.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.118.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" }
			set_country_flag = spanish_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_spanish_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Borgia" age = 39 }
			}
			if = {

			}
			if = {
