# British Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.119
	title = vef_papacy.119.t
	desc = vef_papacy.119.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.119.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = british_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_british_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 52 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 53 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 54 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 55 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 56 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 56 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 57 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 57 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 58 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 58 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 59 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 59 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 60 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 61 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 62 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 62 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 63 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 64 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}

# Roman Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.120
	title = vef_papacy.120.t
	desc = vef_papacy.120.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.120.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = roman_pope
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 51 }
			}
			if = {

			if = {

			if = {

				define_ruler = { age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# North-Italian Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.121
	title = vef_papacy.121.t
	desc = vef_papacy.121.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.121.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_year = 1460
					NOT = { is_year = 1490 }
				}
				
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Riaro" }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_year = 1490
					NOT = { is_year = 1550 }
				}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "della Rovere" }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						NOT = { is_year = 1460 }
						is_year = 1550
					}
				}
				define_ruler = {}
			}
			set_country_flag = northitalian_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_northitalian_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
				OR = {
					NOT = { is_year = 1460 }
					is_year = 1550
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}

				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}

				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {

				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "della Rovere" age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "della Rovere" age = 42 }

# Neopolitan Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.122
	title = vef_papacy.122.t
	desc = vef_papacy.122.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.122.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = neopolitan_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_neopolitan_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 52 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 53 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 54 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 55 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 56 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 56 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 57 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 57 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 58 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 58 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 59 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 59 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 60 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 61 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 62 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 62 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 63 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 64 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Medici Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.123
	title = vef_papacy.123.t
	desc = vef_papacy.123.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.123.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
			set_country_flag = medici_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_medici_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}

			if = {

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}

				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}

			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 79 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" age = 80 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# Sforza Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.124
	title = vef_papacy.124.t
	desc = vef_papacy.124.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.124.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" }
			set_country_flag = sforza_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_sforza_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 51 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 52 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 53 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}

			}
			if = {

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 55 }
			}
			if = {

			}
			if = {

			if = {

			}
			if = {

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 59 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 60 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 61 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 62 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 62 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 63 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 63 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 64 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 64 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 65 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 65 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 66 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 66 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 67 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 67 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 73 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 74 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 74 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 75 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 76 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 77 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 77 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 78 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 78 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 79 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 80 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "Sforza" age = 80 }
			}
		}

# d'Este Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.125
	title = vef_papacy.125.t
	desc = vef_papacy.125.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.125.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" }
			set_country_flag = este_pope
			every_country = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = spent_este_money }
				add_country_modifier = { name = papal_sponsor duration = -1 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 34 }
			}

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 35 }

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 44 }
			}
			if = {

			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 68 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 68 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 69 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 69 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 70 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 70 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 71 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 71 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 72 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 72 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 73 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 73 }

			if = {

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 74 }
			}
			if = {

				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 75 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 76 }}}
				define_ruler = { dynasty = "d'Este" age = 76 }

# Ultramontane Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.126
	title = vef_papacy.126.t
	desc = vef_papacy.126.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.126.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }
			define_ruler = {}
			set_country_flag = ultramontane_pope
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame }}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 30 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 30 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 31 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 31 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 32 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 32 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 33 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 33 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 34 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 34 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 35 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 35 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 36 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 36 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 37 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 37 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 38 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 38 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 39 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 39 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 40 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 40 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 41 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 41 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 42 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 42 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 43 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 43 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 44 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 44 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 45 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 45 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 46 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 46 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 47 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 47 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 48 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 48 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 49 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 49 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 50 }}}
				define_ruler = { age = 50 }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 51 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 52 }}}

			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 53 }}}

			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 54 }}}

			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 55 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 56 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 57 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 58 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 59 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 60 }}}

			}
			if = {
				limit = { REB = { is_variable_equal = { which = papal_age value = 61 }}}

			}
