#################
# Generate Pope #
#################
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.150
	title = vef_papacy.150.t
	desc = vef_papacy.150.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	#vef_setup.1
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_ruler = "Sede"
		dynasty = "Vacante"
	}
	
	option = {
		define_ruler = { age = 60 }
	}
}


##################
# Western Schism #
##################

# Western Schism
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.200
	title = vef_papacy.200.t
	desc = vef_papacy.200.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		135 = { add_core = AVI set_in_empire = no }
		set_capital = 227
		227 = { set_in_empire = no }
		release = AVI
		AVI = { change_government = theocracy add_government_reform = papacy_reform }
		FRA = { vassalize = AVI set_country_flag = overlord_flag_AVI }
		hidden_effect = {
			clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_initial
			set_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
			remove_country_modifier = babylonian_captivity
			AVI = {
				set_country_flag = vassal_flag
				set_variable = { which = vassal_progress value = 20 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.200.opta"
		hidden_effect = {
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
					ai = no
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.201 days = 1 }
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					is_part_of_hre = yes
					religion = catholic
				}
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					capital_scope = { region = france_region }
					religion = catholic
				}
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SCO = {
						religion = catholic
						ai = yes
					}
				}
				SCO = {
					set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
				}
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					ai = yes
					capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }
					religion = catholic
					NOT = { tag = POR }
				}
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NAP = {
						religion = catholic
						ai = yes
					}
				}
				NAP = {
					set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					SCL = {
						religion = catholic
						ai = yes
					}
				}
				SCL = {
					set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
					every_owned_province = {
						limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
						set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
						AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
					}
				}
			}
			every_known_country = {
				limit = {
					religion = catholic
					ai = yes
					NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
					NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
				}
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
			AVI = { set_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_prorome_cardinals }}
			AVI = { change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_proavignon_cardinals }}
			AVI = { multiply_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0.8 }}
		}
	}
}

# Western Schism - Choose Sides
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.201
	title = vef_papacy.201.t
	desc = vef_papacy.201.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = { NOT = { tag = FRA }}
		name = "vef_papacy.201.opta"
		set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
		add_prestige = 1
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = schism_opinions_applied }}
				every_country = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
					add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
					reverse_add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
					every_country = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
						add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
					}
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
					add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
					reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
					every_country = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
						add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = schism_opinions_applied
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
			AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
		}
		AVI = { set_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_prorome_cardinals }}
		AVI = { change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_proavignon_cardinals }}
		AVI = { multiply_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0.8 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.201.optb"
		set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
		add_prestige = 1
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = schism_opinions_applied }}
				every_country = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
					add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
					reverse_add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
					every_country = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
						add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
					}
				}
				every_country = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
					add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
					reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
					every_country = {
						limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
						add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
					}
				}
				set_global_flag = schism_opinions_applied
			}
		}
		every_owned_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
			AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
		}
		AVI = { set_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_prorome_cardinals }}
		AVI = { change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_proavignon_cardinals }}
		AVI = { multiply_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0.8 }}
	}
}

# Western Schism - New Monarch
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.202
	title = vef_papacy.202.t
	desc = vef_papacy.202.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		religion = catholic
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		NOT = { tag = FRA }
		NOT = { government = papal_government }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.202.opta"
		add_legitimacy = 5
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.202.optb"
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
		set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
		remove_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
		AVI = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }}
		every_known_country = {
			remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
		}
		add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
		reverse_add_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
		every_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
			add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
		}
		
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.202.opta"
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
		set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
		remove_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
		PAP = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }}
		every_known_country = {
			remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
		}
		add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
		reverse_add_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
		every_country = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
			add_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.202.optb"
		add_legitimacy = 5
	}
}

# Western Schism - Ended by Cardinal Majority
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.203
	title = vef_papacy.203.t
	desc = vef_papacy.203.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		had_global_flag = { flag = vef_papacy_schism days = 1000 }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				tag = PAP
				AVI = { check_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals which = schism_ending_majority }}
			}
			AND = {
				tag = AVI
				check_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals which = schism_ending_majority }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { tag = PAP }
		name = "vef_papacy.203.opta"
		FRA = { free_vassal = AVI }
		AVI = {
			remove_government_reform = papacy_reform
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 0 }
			}
		}
		inherit = AVI
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		set_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				NOT = { tag = PAP }
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.206 days = 3 }
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			clr_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
			clr_province_flag = pro_avingon_cardinal
		}
		REB = { set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 20 }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { tag = AVI }
		name = "vef_papacy.203.opta"
		FRA = { free_vassal = AVI }
		hidden_effect = {
			exile_ruler_as = vef_current_pope
			remove_government_reform = papacy_reform
			set_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 0 }
			set_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 0 }
		}
		PAP = {
			inherit = AVI
			set_ruler = vef_current_pope
		}
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		set_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		every_country = {
			limit = { religion = catholic }
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.207 days = 3 }
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			clr_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
			clr_province_flag = pro_avingon_cardinal
		}
		REB = { set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 20 }}
	}
	
}

# Western Schism - Ended by Force
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.204
	title = vef_papacy.204.t
	desc = vef_papacy.10041.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		OR = {
			AND = {
				has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
				135 = { controlled_by = ROOT }
			}
			AND = {
				has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				227 = { controlled_by = ROOT }
			}
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = { war_with = PAP }
			white_peace = PAP
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = { war_with = AVI }
			white_peace = AVI
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.204.opta"
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.205 days = 1 }}
		add_prestige = 20
		add_legitimacy = 10
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
				is_core = ROOT
				is_capital = no
				religion = catholic
				continent = europe
				NOT = { province_id = 103 }
				NOT = { province_id = 96 }
				NOT = { province_id = 63 }
				NOT = { province_id = 22 }
				NOT = { province_id = 175 }
				NOT = { province_id = 130 }
				NOT = { province_id = 333 }
				NOT = { province_id = 298 }
				NOT = { province_id = 114 }
			}
			add_permanent_province_modifier = {  name = cardinal_seat duration = -1 }
		}
	}
}

# Western Schism - Ended by Force
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.205
	title = vef_papacy.205.t
	desc = vef_papacy.205.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { FROM = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }}
			set_country_flag = stay_in_avignon
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.205.opta"
		FRA = { free_vassal = AVI }
		AVI = {
			remove_government_reform = papacy_reform
			hidden_effect = {
				set_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 0 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = stay_in_avignon }
			AVI = { exile_ruler_as = vef_current_pope }
			set_ruler = vef_current_pope
		}
		inherit = AVI
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		set_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
			clr_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
			clr_province_flag = pro_avingon_cardinal
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_country_flag = stay_in_avignon } }
			every_country = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.206 days = 3 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = stay_in_avignon }
			set_capital = 135
			every_country = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.207 days = 3 }
			}
		}
		REB = { set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 20 }}
	}
}

# Western Schism - Ended for Rome (Notification)
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.206
	title = vef_papacy.206.t
	desc = vef_papacy.206.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
				remove_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
				AVI = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
				remove_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
				PAP = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
		name = "vef_papacy.206.opta"
		add_prestige = 5
		add_legitimacy = 5
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
		name = "vef_papacy.206.optb"
		add_prestige = -5
		add_legitimacy = -5
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
	}
}

# Western Schism - Ended for Avignon (Notification)
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.207
	title = vef_papacy.207.t
	desc = vef_papacy.207.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
				remove_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
				AVI = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
				remove_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
				PAP = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
		name = "vef_papacy.207.opta"
		add_prestige = -5
		add_legitimacy = -5
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
		name = "vef_papacy.207.optb"
		add_prestige = 5
		add_legitimacy = 5
		clr_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
	}
}

# Council of Constance
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.208
	title = vef_papacy.208.t
	desc = vef_papacy.208.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		government = papal_government
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		had_global_flag = { flag = vef_papacy_schism days = 12775 }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.208.opta"
		define_ruler = {}
		clr_country_flag = italian_pope
		set_country_flag = roman_pope
		FRA = { free_vassal = AVI }
		AVI = {
			remove_government_reform = papacy_reform
			set_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 0 }
			set_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 0 }
		}
		inherit = AVI
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		set_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		every_country = {
			limit = { religion = catholic }
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.209 days = 3 }
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
			clr_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
			clr_province_flag = pro_avingon_cardinal
		}
		REB = { set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 20 }}
	}
}

# Inform Catholics of Council of Constance
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.209
	title = vef_papacy.209.t
	desc = vef_papacy.209.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
				remove_opinion = { who = AVI modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }
				AVI = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = rmsupporter_opinion_avi }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
				clr_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
				remove_opinion = { who = PAP modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }
				PAP = { remove_opinion = { who = ROOT modifier = avisupporter_opinion_rome }}
				every_country = {
					remove_opinion = { who = PREV modifier = opposite_side_schism }
				}
				clr_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.209.opta"
	}
}

# Moves Back to Rome Anyway
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.210
	title = vef_papacy.210.t
	desc = vef_papacy.210.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	major = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		capital = 135
		owns = 227
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.210.opta"
		set_capital = 227
	}
}

# Game-start Cleanup ( If started during the schism )
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.211
	title = vef_papacy.211.t
	desc = vef_papacy.211.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism
		FRA = {
			religion = catholic
			NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		every_country = { remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.211.opta"
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				ai = no
			}
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.201 days = 1 }
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				is_part_of_hre = yes
				religion = catholic
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
				AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
			}
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				capital_scope = { region = france_region }
				religion = catholic
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
				AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				SCO = {
					religion = catholic
					ai = yes
				}
			}
			SCO = {
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }
				religion = catholic
				NOT = { tag = POR }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
				AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NAP = {
					religion = catholic
					ai = yes
				}
			}
			NAP = {
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				SCL = {
					religion = catholic
					ai = yes
				}
			}
			SCL = {
				set_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
					set_province_flag = pro_avignon_cardinal
					AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_proavignon_cardinals value = 1 }}
				}
			}
		}
		every_known_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				ai = yes
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_rome }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_supports_avignon }
			}
			set_country_flag = vef_supports_rome
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				set_province_flag = pro_rome_cardinal
				AVI = { change_variable = { which = vef_prorome_cardinals value = 1 }}
			}
		}
		AVI = { set_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0 }}
		AVI = { change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_prorome_cardinals }}
		AVI = { change_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority which = vef_proavignon_cardinals }}
		AVI = { multiply_variable = { which = schism_ending_majority value = 0.8 }}
	}
}


# College Expansion
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.300
	title = vef_papacy.300.t
	desc = vef_papacy.300.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		is_year = 1500
		NOT = { has_country_flag = roman_pope }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 60 }
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.300.opta"
		set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 30 }
		add_prestige = -10
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = french_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = france_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = british_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
					#province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group
					OR = {
						area = romagna_area
						area = tuscany_area
						area = liguria_area
						area = emilia_area
						area = venetia_area
						area = piedmont_area
						area = lombardy_area
						area = aquileia_area
					}
				}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
					#province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group
					OR = {
						area = romagna_area
						area = tuscany_area
						area = liguria_area
						area = emilia_area
						area = venetia_area
						area = piedmont_area
						area = lombardy_area
						area = aquileia_area
					}
				}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
					#province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group
					OR = {
						area = romagna_area
						area = tuscany_area
						area = liguria_area
						area = emilia_area
						area = venetia_area
						area = piedmont_area
						area = lombardy_area
						area = aquileia_area
					}
				}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						#province_group = two_sicilies_group
						OR = {
							area = sicily_area
							area = calabria_area
							area = apulia_area
							area = naples_area
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						#province_group = two_sicilies_group
						OR = {
							area = sicily_area
							area = calabria_area
							area = apulia_area
							area = naples_area
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					capital_scope = {
						#province_group = two_sicilies_group
						OR = {
							area = sicily_area
							area = calabria_area
							area = apulia_area
							area = naples_area
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = medici_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_reform = medici_republic
						AND = {
							government = monarchy
							dynasty = "de Medici"
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_reform = medici_republic
						AND = {
							government = monarchy
							dynasty = "de Medici"
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = { 
					OR = {
						has_reform = medici_republic
						AND = {
							government = monarchy
							dynasty = "de Medici"
						}
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "Sforza"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "Sforza"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "Sforza"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = este_pope }
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "d'Este"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 7 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "d'Este"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 14 }
			}
			random_country = {
				limit = {
					AND = {
						government = monarchy
						dynasty = "d'Este"
					}
				}
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2 days = 21 }
			}
		}
	}
}

# College Expansion - Endgame
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.301
	title = vef_papacy.301.t
	desc = vef_papacy.301.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		is_year = 1540
		NOT = { has_country_flag = roman_pope }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 60 }
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.300.opta"
		REB = {
			set_variable = { which = vef_college_maximum value = 45 }
			clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
			set_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame
		}
		add_prestige = -5
		hidden_effect = {
			every_province = {
				limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
				remove_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
				set_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 0 }
				set_variable = { which = cardinal_age value = 0 }
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_present }
					remove_province_modifier = cardinal_present
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_court }
					clr_province_flag = cardinal_court
					owner = { remove_country_modifier = cardinal_court }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal_rome }
					clr_province_flag = cardinal_rome
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = large_investment }
					clr_province_flag = large_investment
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_flag = small_investment }
					clr_province_flag = small_investment
				}
			}
			set_variable = { which = vef_required_majority which = vef_college_size }
			multiply_variable = { which = vef_required_majority value = 0.5 }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = french_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_french_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_spanish_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = british_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_british_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = ultramontane_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_ultramontane_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_neopolitan_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = medici_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_medici_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = este_pope }
			REB = { change_variable = { which = vef_este_cardinals value = 3 }}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = { religion = catholic }
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.302 days = 3 }
		}
	}
}

# Endgame Message
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.302
	title = vef_papacy.302.t
	desc = vef_papacy.302.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.302.opta"
	}
}

####################
# Sforza Cardinals #
####################

# Sforza Pressure on Cardinal of Milan
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.400
	title = vef_papacy.400.t
	desc = vef_papacy.400.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = MLO
		government = monarchy
		dynasty = "Sforza"
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		owns = 263
		263 = {
			has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese
			has_province_flag = northitalian_cardinal
		}
		REB = {
			NOT = { has_country_flag = sforza_faction_active }
			NOT = { has_country_flag = sforza_faction_over }
		}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		REB = { set_country_flag = sforza_faction_active }
	}

	option = {	# Enforce our will
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.400.opta"
		263 = {
			clr_province_flag = northitalian_cardinal
			set_province_flag = sforza_cardinal
		}
		REB = {
			change_variable = { which = vef_northitalian_cardinals value = -1 }
			change_variable = { which = vef_sforza_cardinals value = 1 }
		}
	}

	option = {	# Let him be
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.400.optb"
		add_prestige = 5
		add_legitimacy = 5
	}
}

# End of the Sforza
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.401
	title = vef_papacy.401.t
	desc = vef_papacy.401.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PAP
			AND = {
				tag = REB
				NOT = { exists = PAP }
			}
		}
		REB = { has_country_flag = sforza_faction_active }
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }}
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		NOT = { any_known_country = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }}
		NOT = { 234 = { has_province_modifier = caterina_sforza }}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		REB = { set_country_flag = sforza_faction_over }
		REB = { clr_country_flag = sforza_faction_active }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.401.opta"
	}
}

#####################
# Medici Cardinals
#####################

# Medici request a Florentine cardinal
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.500
	title = vef_papacy.500.t
	desc = vef_papacy.500.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			has_reform = medici_republic
			AND = {
				government = monarchy
				dynasty = "de Medici"
			}
		}
		is_year = 1460
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		prestige = 30
		NOT = { 237 = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }}
		NOT = { war_with = PAP }
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_active }}
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_over }}
	}
	
	immediate = {
		REB = { set_country_flag = medici_faction_active }
	}

	option = {	# Make the request
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.500.opta"
		PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.501 days = 2 }}
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = { NOT = { exists = PAP }}
				REB = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.501 days = 2 }}
			}
		}
	}

	option = {	# Not at this time
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.500.optb"
	}
}

# PAP - Medici seek a cardinal for Firenze
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.501
	title = vef_papacy.501.t
	desc = vef_papacy.501.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {	# Appoint one
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.501.opta"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.502 days = 5 }}
		add_years_of_income = 0.5
	}
	
	option = {	# Refuse
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.501.optb"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.503 days = 5 }}
	}
}

# Pope Grants Cardinal
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.502
	title = vef_papacy.502.t
	desc = vef_papacy.502.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.502.opta"
		add_years_of_income = -0.2
		237 = {
			add_permanent_province_modifier = {
				name = cardinal_seat
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.3 days = 3 }
	}
}

# Pope Refuses Medici Cardinal
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.503
	title = vef_papacy.503.t
	desc = vef_papacy.503.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.503.opta"
		add_prestige = -5
	}		
}

# End of the Medici
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.504
	title = vef_papacy.504.t
	desc = vef_papacy.504.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		OR = {
			tag = PAP
			AND = {
				tag = REB
				NOT = { exists = PAP }
			}
		}
		REB = { has_country_flag = medici_faction_active }
		OR = {
			AND = {
				exists = FLR
				NOT = { FLR = { has_reform = medici_republic }}
			}
			AND = {
				exists = TUS
				NOT = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
			}
			AND = {
				NOT = { exists = FLR }
				NOT = { exists = TUS }
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_flag = medici_pope }
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.504.opta"
		REB = { clr_country_flag  = medici_faction_active }
		REB = { set_country_flag = medici_faction_over }
	}
}

# Pope restores Medici to Florence
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.505
	title = vef_papacy.505.t
	desc = vef_papacy.505.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
	}
	
	option = {	# Establish the Archduchy
		ai_chance = { factor = 20 }
		name = "vef_papacy.505.opta"
		237 = { add_core = TUS }
		release = TUS
		TUS = {
			change_government = monarchy
			define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
			define_heir = { dynasty = "de Medici" }
		}
	}
	
	option = {	# Rule from Rome
		ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
		name = "vef_papacy.505.optb"
		237 = { add_core = TUS }
		release = TUS
		TUS = { change_government = monarchy }
		create_union = TUS
		set_country_flag = florence_pap_union
	}
	
	option = {	# Make Papal Lands
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.505.optc"
		237 = { add_core = PAP }
	}
}

# Medici free on death of Medici Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.506
	title = vef_papacy.506.t
	desc = vef_papacy.506.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_country_flag = florence_pap_union
		NOT = { REB = { has_country_flag = medici_pope }}
		TUS = { is_subject_of = PAP }
	}

	option = {
		trigger = { TUS = { is_subject_of = PAP }}
		name = "vef_papacy.506.opta"
		clr_country_flag = florence_pap_union
		break_union = TUS
		TUS = { define_ruler = { dynasty = "de Medici" }}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { NOT = { TUS = { is_subject_of = PAP }}}
		name = "vef_papacy.506.opta"
		clr_country_flag = florence_pap_union
	}
}


##################
# Borgia Flavour #
##################

# Cesare Borgia and the Duchy of Romagna
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.600
	title = vef_papacy.600.t
	desc = vef_papacy.600.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	fire_only_once = yes
	
	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_country_flag = borgia_pope
		is_year = 1495
		NOT = { exists = RMG }
	}
	
	mean_time_to_happen = { months = 120 }
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 75 }
		name = "vef_papacy.600.optb"
		define_general = {
			name = "Cesare Borgia"
			fire = 3
			shock = 2
			manuever = 2
			siege = 3
		}
		REB = { set_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 25 }
		name = "vef_papacy.600.optc"
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.600.opta"
		change_tag = RMG
		every_owned_province = { remove_core = PAP }
		118 = { add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = vatican_city duration = -1  }}
		change_government = monarchy
		define_general = {	
			name = "Cesare Borgia" 	
			fire = 3	
			shock = 2	
			manuever = 2	
			siege = 3	
		}
		define_ruler = {
			name = "Cesare"
			dynasty = "Borgia"
			adm = 5
			dip = 3
			mil = 4
			attach_leader = "Cesare Borgia"
		}
		REB = { set_country_flag = final_borgia_pope }
	}
}


##################
#Papal Conversion#
##################

# Pope force-converted to Orthodox
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.800
	title = vef_papacy.800.t
	desc = vef_papacy.800.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	fire_only_once = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		OR = {
			religion = orthodox
			religion = coptic
			religion = nestorian
		}
	}
	
	immediate = { clr_global_flag = vef_new_papacy }
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.800.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { religion = orthodox }
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = { religion = catholic }
				change_religion = orthodox
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = RMG }}
			change_tag = RMG
		}
		remove_government_reform = papacy_reform
	}
}


# Pope force-converted by Reformers; Papacy dissolves
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.801
	title = vef_papacy.801.t
	desc = vef_papacy.801.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	fire_only_once = yes
	
	major = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		NOT = { religion = catholic }
		NOT = { religion = orthodox }
		NOT = { religion = coptic }
		NOT = { religion = nestorian }
	}
	
	immediate = { clr_global_flag = vef_new_papacy }
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.801.opta"
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { exists = RMG }}
			change_tag = RMG
		}
		change_government = republic
	}
}


###################
# Papal Influence #
###################

# Papal Influence - Initial Decision
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.900
	title = vef_papacy.900.t
	desc = vef_papacy.900.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	immediate = {
		custom_tooltip = inf_current
	
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_cardinal
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_stability
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_unrest
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_missionary
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_legitimacy
		custom_tooltip = inf_cost_taxes
	}
	
	option = {	#Cardinal
		trigger = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_final }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 25
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = vef_our_cardinals value = 1 }}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.900.opta"
		country_event = { id = vef_papacy.901 }
	}
	
	option = {	#Stability
		trigger = {
			NOT = { stability = 3 }
			check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 40 }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				stability = 2
				factor = 0.1
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.900.optb"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -40 }
		change_variable = { which = national_stability value = 250 }
		add_corruption = 3
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {	#Unrest
		name = "vef_papacy.900.optc"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 15
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_owned_province = { unrest = 5 }}
				factor = 0
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
		add_corruption = 1
		every_owned_province = { limit = { religion = catholic } add_province_modifier = { name = pi_unrest duration = 730 }}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {	#Missionaries
		trigger = { check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 30 }}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.900.optd"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -30 }
		add_country_modifier = { name = papacy_missionaries duration = 1800 }
		add_corruption = 2
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {	#Legitimacy
		trigger = {
			government = monarchy
			check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 50 }
			NOT = { has_ruler_flag = sought_investiture }
			NOT = { legitimacy = 50 }
			OR = {
				PAP = { has_opinion = { who = ROOT value = 25 }}
				NOT = { exists = PAP }
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 80 }
		name = "vef_papacy.900.opte"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -50 }
		add_legitimacy = 50
		add_corruption = 2
		set_ruler_flag = sought_investiture
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {	#Taxes
		trigger = { check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 75 }}
		ai_chance = { factor = 5 }
		name = "vef_papacy.900.optf"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -75 }
		add_treasury = 150
		add_corruption = 3
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {	#Friendship
		trigger = {
			check_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = 25 }
			NOT = { has_country_modifier = pap_dip_bonus }
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.900.optg"
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -25 }
		add_country_modifier = { name = pap_dip_bonus duration = 7300 }
		add_corruption = 1
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.900.opth"
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
	}
}

# Papal Influence - Cardinals
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.901
	title = vef_papacy.901.t
	desc = vef_papacy.901.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal1_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.opta"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal1 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal1_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal2_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.optb"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal2 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal2_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive

	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal3_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal3 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal3 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal3 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.optc"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal3 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal3_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }

		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal14_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal14 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal14 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal14 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.optn"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal14 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal14_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
	}

				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal25 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal25 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal25 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.opty"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal25 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal25_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal26_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal26 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal26 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal26 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 80 }}
				factor = 3
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.901.optz"
		every_province = { 
			limit = { has_province_flag = cardinal26 }
			custom_tooltip = define_cardinal
			hidden_effect = {
				if = {
					limit = { NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 100 }}}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 1 }
				}
			}
		}
		change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 5 }
		every_country = {
			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal26_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal27_active }}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 10
			modifier = {
				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 50 }}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				NOT = { any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal27 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 50 }}}
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 65 }
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {
				check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 85 }
				factor = 0
			}
			modifier = {
				any_province = { has_province_flag = cardinal27 check_variable = { which = cardinal_power value = 60 }}
				factor = 3
			}
			modifier = {

			limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 65 }}
			change_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = -2 }
			if = {
				limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 70 }}
				change_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = -2 }
				ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = -1 }}
				if = {
					limit = { check_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 80 }}
					change_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = 3 }
					ROOT = { change_variable = { which = cardinal27_relation value = -2 }}
				}
			}
		}
		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive
		change_variable = { which = vef_papal_influence value = -20 }
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { REB = { has_country_flag = cardinal28_active }}

			factor = 10

				NOT = { check_variable = { which = cardinal28_relation value = 50 }}

			}

		clr_country_flag = papinf_decactive

######################
# Flight of the Pope #
######################

# Papacy Annexed - Pope Flees
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1000
	title = vef_papacy.1000.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1000.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	hidden = yes
	
	trigger = {
		FROM = { tag = PAP }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism }
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_schism
		}
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism }}
			hidden_effect = { PAP = { exile_ruler_as = vef_current_pope }}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = AVI
				AVI = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 135
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = pap_can_flee }
				exists = TRI
				TRI = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 333
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = SLZ
				SLZ = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 291
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = MAG
				MAG = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 355
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = KOL
				KOL = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 336
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_koln
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = MAI
				MAI = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 328
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_mainz
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = WBG
				WBG = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 325
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_wurzburg
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = LIE
				LIE = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 200
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_liege
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = RIG
				RIG = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 447
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_riga
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = BAS
				BAS = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 278
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_basel
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = BRE
				BRE = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 377
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_bremen
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = UTR
				UTR = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 184
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_utrecht
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = CHU
				CHU = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 283
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_chur
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = MUN
				MUN = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 338
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_munster
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = ALS
				ALS = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 319
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = STG
				STG = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 286
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				exists = AQU
				AQU = {
					ai = yes
					is_subject = no
					owns = 272
					religion = catholic
					government = archbishopric
				}
			}
			set_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1000.opta"
		every_province = {
			limit = { is_core = PAP }
			add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = papal_core_conquest duration = 100 }
			remove_core = PAP
		}
		random_country = {
			limit = { ai = yes }
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1001 days = 1 }
		}
	}
}

# Papacy Annexed - Pope Flees
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1001
	title = vef_papacy.1001.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1001.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1001.opta"
		trigger = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism }
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 75
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism }
			}
		}
		FRA = { free_vassal = AVI }
		AVI = { change_tag = PAP }
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest }
			remove_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest
			add_core = PAP
		}
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_schism
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_koln
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_mainz
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_wurzburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_liege
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_riga
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_basel
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_bremen
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_utrecht
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_chur
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_munster
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace 
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1001.opta"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism }
			has_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 20
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism
					NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon }
				}
			}
		}
		AVI = {
			change_tag = PAP
			set_ruler = vef_current_pope
			add_government_reform = papacy_reform
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest }
			remove_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest
			add_core = PAP
		}
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_koln
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_mainz
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_wurzburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_liege
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_riga
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_basel
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_bremen
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_utrecht
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_chur
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_munster
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace 
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1001.opta"
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon }
			has_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
		}
		ai_chance = { factor = 10 }
		TRI = {
			change_tag = PAP
			set_ruler = vef_current_pope
			add_government_reform = papacy_reform
		}
		every_province = {
			limit = { has_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest }
			remove_province_modifier = papal_core_conquest
			add_core = PAP
		}
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_koln
