		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace 
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen
		clr_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = {
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_trier }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_koln }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_mainz }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_wurzburg }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_liege }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_riga }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_basel }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_bremen }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_utrecht }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_chur }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_munster }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen }
			NOT = { has_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia }
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				factor = 0
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_schism
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_avignon
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_trier
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_salzburg
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_magdeburg
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_koln
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_mainz
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_wurzburg
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_liege
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_riga
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_basel
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_bremen
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_utrecht
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_chur
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_munster
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_alsace 
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_gallen
					has_global_flag = pap_fled_aquelia
				}
			}
		}
		name = "vef_papacy.1001.opta"
		227 = { province_event = { id = vef_papacy.1002 days = 3 }}
	}
}

# Papacy Annexed - Vatican City?
province_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1002
	title = vef_papacy.1002.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1002.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1002.opta"
		add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = vatican_city duration = -1 }
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1002.optb"
		every_country = {
			limit = { has_country_modifier = papal_sponsor }
			country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1003 days = 7 }
		}
		set_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope
		set_global_flag = pope_in_exile
	}
}

# Papacy Annexed - Exile
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1003
	title = vef_papacy.1003.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1003.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = french_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = ANV }
				ANV = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					FRA = { num_of_cities = BUR }
				}
				FRA = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = ANV }
					BUR = { num_of_cities = FRA }
				}
				BUR = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = IBE }
				IBE = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					SPA = { num_of_cities = POR }
				}
				SPA = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					NOT = { exists = SPA }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = ARA }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = POR }
					CAS = { num_of_cities = NAV }
				}
				CAS = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					NOT = { exists = SPA }
					ARA = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					ARA = { num_of_cities = POR }
					ARA = { num_of_cities = NAV }
				}
				ARA = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					NOT = { exists = SPA }
					NAV = { num_of_cities = ARA }
					NAV = { num_of_cities = POR }
					NAV = { num_of_cities = CAS }
				}
				NAV = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = IBE }
					POR = { num_of_cities = SPA }
					POR = { num_of_cities = ARA }
					POR = { num_of_cities = CAS }
					POR = { num_of_cities = NAV }
				}
				POR = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = british_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = GBR }
				GBR = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = GBR }
					ENG = { num_of_cities = SCO }
				}
				ENG = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = GBR }
					SCO = { num_of_cities = ENG }
				}
				SCO = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = SCL }
				SCL = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = SCL }
					NAP = { num_of_cities = SIC }
				}
				NAP = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = SCL }
					SIC = { num_of_cities = NAP }
				}
				SIC = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = VEN
					exists = GEN
				}
				random_list = {
					50 = { VEN = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }}
					50 = { GEN = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = VEN
					NOT = { exists = GEN }
				}
				VEN = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					exists = GEN
					NOT = { exists = VEN }
				}
				GEN = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = medici_pope }}
			if = {
				limit = { exists = TUS }
				TUS = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = TUS }
					exists = FLR
				}
				FLR = { set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice }
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { exists = TUS }
					NOT = { exists = FLR }
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "de Medici" }
					set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice		
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }}
			random_country = {
				limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "Sforza" }
				set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice		
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = este_pope }}
			random_country = {
				limit = { government = monarchy dynasty = "d'Este" }
				set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice		
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { REB = { has_country_flag = roman_pope }}
			random_country = {
				limit = { total_development = 150 }
				set_country_flag = papal_flight_choice		
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1003.opta"
		set_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = { is_capital = yes }
			add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = pope_in_exile duration = -1 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1003.optb"
		set_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope
		add_prestige = -10
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_country = {
							has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
						}
					}
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						total_development = 150
						capital_scope = { continent = europe }
						NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
					}
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1004 days = 3 }
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
					}
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
					}
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1004 days = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Papacy Annexed - Exile
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1004
	title = vef_papacy.1004.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1004.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 100 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1004.opta"
		set_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		random_owned_province = {
			limit = { is_capital = yes }
			add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = pope_in_exile duration = -1 }
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		ai_chance = { factor = 0 }
		name = "vef_papacy.1004.optb"
		set_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope
		add_prestige = -10
		hidden_effect = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						any_country = {
							has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
							religion = catholic
							NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
						}
					}
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						total_development = 150
						capital_scope = { continent = europe }
						NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
					}
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1004 days = 3 }
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							any_country = {
								religion = catholic
								total_development = 150
								capital_scope = { continent = europe }
								NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
							}
						}
					}
					random_country = {
						limit = { religion = catholic capital_scope = { continent = europe }}
						country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1005 days = 30 }
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					any_country = {
						has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
						religion = catholic
						NOT = { has_country_flag = vef_rejected_pope }
					}
				}
				random_country = {
					limit = {
						religion = catholic
						has_country_flag = papal_flight_choice
					}
					country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1004 days = 3 }
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

#Papacy Annexed - Death in Wandering Exile
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1005
	title = vef_papacy.1005.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1005.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	major = yes
	
	immediate = {
		clr_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_final
		clr_global_flag = vef_papacy_endgame
		clr_global_flag = pope_in_exile
		every_province = {
			limit = { is_core = PAP }
			remove_core = PAP
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1005.opta"
	}
}

#Papacy in Exile - Rome Freed
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1006
	title = vef_papacy.1006.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1006.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		exists = PAP
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1006.opta"
		clr_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		capital_scope = { remove_province_modifier = pope_in_exile }
	}
}

#Papacy in Exile - Rome Taken
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1007
	title = vef_papacy.1007.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1007.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	trigger = {
		has_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		owns_or_vassal_of = 227
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1006.opta"
		clr_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		capital_scope = { remove_province_modifier = pope_in_exile }
		227 = { add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = vatican_city duration = -1 }}
		add_prestige = 20
	}
}

#Papacy in Exile - Holder of Rome offers Vatican (Decision)
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1008
	title = vef_papacy.1008.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1008.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1008.opta"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.1009 days = 7 }}
		clr_country_flag = vef_papal_refuge
		capital_scope = { remove_province_modifier = pope_in_exile }
	}
}

#Papacy in Exile - Pope Returns to Vatican
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.1009
	title = vef_papacy.1009.t
	desc = vef_papacy.1009.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes

	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.1009.opta"
		227 = { add_permanent_province_modifier = { name = vatican_city duration = -1 }}
		add_prestige = 20
	}
}


######################
# Virtus Post Solium #
######################

# Calculator
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2000
	title = vef_papacy.2000.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2000.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture
	
	is_triggered_only = yes	#on_actions/bi-yearly pulse or end of any election
	
	hidden = yes

	trigger = {
		tag = PAP
		has_regency = no
		is_subject = no
		has_global_flag = vef_new_papacy
		NOT = { has_global_flag = vef_papacy_schism }
		ai = yes
	}
	
	immediate = {
		event_target:virtus_post_solium_tag = {
			PAP = { set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0 }}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 10 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 20 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 20 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 30 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 8 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 30 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 40 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 10 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 40 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 50 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 12 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 50 }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 14 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 4 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 5 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 6 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = theologian }
				 PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = inquisitor }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = jesuit }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = vef_defender_faith }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 4 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = counter_reformation }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 100 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 150 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 190 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = french_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = france_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = british_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							area = sicily_area
							area = calabria_area
							area = apulia_area
							area = naples_area
						}
					}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }
					capital_scope = { province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }
					government = monarchy
					dynasty = "Sforza"
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
					PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.5 }}
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.25 }}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { government = republic }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = -2 }}
			}
			PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 10 }}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						PAP = { war_with = PREV }
						has_country_modifier = ruler_excommunicated
						has_country_modifier = under_interdict
					}
				}
				PAP = { set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0 }}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				religion = catholic
				NOT = { government = papal_government }
				is_subject = no
				NOT = { has_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium }
			}
			PAP = { set_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0 }}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 10 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 20 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 20 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 30 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 8 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 30 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 40 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 10 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 40 }
					NOT = { num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 50 }}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 12 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					num_of_owned_provinces_with = { religion = catholic value = 50 }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 14 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 4 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 5 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { dip = 6 }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0.5 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = theologian }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = inquisitor }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { advisor = jesuit }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = vef_defender_faith }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 4 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { has_country_modifier = counter_reformation }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 100 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 150 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { has_opinion = { who = PREV value = 190 }}}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 1 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = french_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = france_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = spanish_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = iberia_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = british_pope }
					capital_scope = { region = british_isles_region }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = neopolitan_pope }
					capital_scope = {
						OR = {
							area = sicily_area
							area = calabria_area
							area = apulia_area
							area = naples_area
						}
					}
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = northitalian_pope }
					capital_scope = { province_group = northitalian_cardinals_group }
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 2 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PAP = { has_country_flag = sforza_pope }
					government = monarchy
					dynasty = "Sforza"
				}
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 3 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { government = republic }
				PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = -2 }}
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_seat }
					PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.5 }}
					else = {
						if = {
							limit = { has_province_modifier = cardinal_diocese }
							PAP = { change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0.25 }}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						PAP = { war_with = PREV }
						has_country_modifier = ruler_excommunicated
						has_country_modifier = under_interdict
						has_country_modifier = not_eligible_vps
					}
				}
				PAP = { set_variable = { which = vps_second_factor value = 0 }}
			}
			if = {
				limit = { PAP = { check_variable = { which = vps_second_factor which = vps_lead_factor }}}
				every_country = { clr_country_flag = new_vps_nation }
				clear_global_event_target = virtus_post_solium_tag
				set_country_flag = new_vps_nation
				PAP = {
					set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor which = vps_second_factor }
					change_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 1 }
					set_country_flag = vps_change
				}
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2000.opta"
	}
}

# Notify old Virtus Post Solium
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2001
	title = vef_papacy.2001.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2001.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	immediate = {
		remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2001.opta"
		add_prestige = -5
	}
}

# Virtus Post Solium must guarantee or ally with the Pope
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2002
	title = vef_papacy.2002.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2002.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes
	
	trigger = {
		NOT = { alliance_with = PAP }
		NOT = { has_guaranteed = PAP }
	}
	
	immediate = {
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_three }
			clr_country_flag = vps_warning_three
			remove_country_modifier = virtus_post_solium
			clear_global_event_target = virtus_post_solium_tag
			PAP = { set_variable = { which = vps_lead_factor value = 0 }}
			PAP = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2000 }}
			hidden_effect = {
				add_country_modifier = { name = not_eligible_vps duration = 730 hidden = yes }
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_two }
			clr_country_flag = vps_warning_two
			set_country_flag = vps_warning_three
		}
		if = {
			limit = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_one }
			clr_country_flag = vps_warning_one
			set_country_flag = vps_warning_two
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_one }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_two }
				NOT = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_three }
			}
			set_country_flag = vps_warning_one
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { NOT = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_three }}
		name = "vef_papacy.2002.opta"
		add_prestige = -1
		if = {
			limit = {
				ai = yes
				NOT = { has_guaranteed = PAP }
				NOT = { alliance_with = PAP }
			}
			if = {
				limit = { total_development = 200 }
				create_guarantee = PAP
				else = { create_alliance = PAP }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		trigger = { has_country_flag = vps_warning_three }
		name = "vef_papacy.2002.optb"
		add_prestige = -5
	}
}

# Virtus Post Solium Request
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2003
	title = vef_papacy.2003.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2003.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes #diplomatic actions
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2003.opta"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2004 }}
		clr_country_flag = new_vps_nation
		hidden_effect = { 
			event_target:virtus_post_solium_tag = {
				country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2001 }
			}
		}
		add_country_modifier = { name = virtus_post_solium duration = -1 }
		add_prestige = 10
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { alliance_with = FROM } NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM } total_development = 200 }
			create_guarantee = FROM
		}
		
		if = {
			limit = { NOT = { alliance_with = FROM } NOT = { has_guaranteed = FROM } NOT = { total_development = 200 }}
			create_alliance = FROM
		}
		save_global_event_target_as = virtus_post_solium_tag
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2003.optb"
		FROM = { country_event = { id = vef_papacy.2005 }}
	}
}

# Request Agreed
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2004
	title = vef_papacy.2004.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2004.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes #vef_papacy.2003
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2004.opta"
	}
}

# Request Refused
country_event = {
	id = vef_papacy.2005
	title = vef_papacy.2005.t
	desc = vef_papacy.2005.d
	picture = VEF_POPE_PREACHING_eventPicture

	is_triggered_only = yes #vef_papacy.2003
	
	option = {
		name = "vef_papacy.2005.opta"
	}
}
